help_text:
This bot creates customizable polls. You can set poll visibility, duration, and vote limits.

- Use /start to create a poll.

- If you want to disable poll forwarding, add the bot to the group of people who are allowed to vote and create the poll inside the group.

- Send /polls to manage your existing polls.
